description:
When you haven’t got a battery to swap, and you need power ASAP, this powerbank delivers. Equipped with a 60W USB-C Power Deliver (PD) port, the Venture 75 charges your devices as fast as they can take it. Goal Zero has up-armoured their latest Venture powerbanks, adding a protective rubber sleeve to keep it safe at the bottom of your pack.

  • Works with your favourite USB powered devices: smartphone 5-6 charges, POV camera 12-14 charges, headlamp 12-14 charges, tablet one 2 charges and USB-C powered laptops 1 charge
  • 60W USB-C PD port offers high-speed charging (in and out)
  • Pass-through charging lets you charge your device while the Venture is being charged
  • Charge time is about 1.5 hours from a 60W USB-C PD port or 6 hours from a USB-A port
  • Input/output: USB type-C 5-20V, up to 3A (60W max) regulated, output: USB A 5V, up to 3A (15W max) regulated
  • Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide offer lower energy density, but longer lives and inherent safety
  • IP67 weather protection means the powerbank isn’t bothered by torrential rain or the occasional dust storm
  • 50 lumen flashlight adds a little versatility on those days that run long
  • During storage you can keep your Venture powerbank plugged into a power source, or fully charge the powerbank every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
  • In the box: Venture powerbank and a USB type-A to USB type-C cable (25cm)
name: Goal Zero Venture 75 Waterproof Power Bank
